protein.general_function: Involved in extracellular-glycine-gated chloride channel activity
protein.specific_function: The glycine receptor is a neurotransmitter-gated ion channel. Binding of glycine to its receptor increases the chloride conductance and thus produces hyperpolarization (inhibition of neuronal firing)

go_class.description: inhibitory extracellular ligand-gated ion channel activity
